Auto.Arima Forecast Learner

Source: R/LearnerRegrForecastAutoArima.R
mlr_learners_regr.auto_arima.Rd

A LearnerRegrForecast for an (AR)I(MA) model implemented in forecast::auto.arima in package forecast.

Format

R6::R6Class inheriting from LearnerForecast.

Methods

See LearnerForecast, additionally:

  • forecast(h = 10, task, new_data) :: data.table
    Returns forecasts after the last training instance.

See also

Dictionary of Learners: mlr3::mlr_learners
